head.title: Please Wait... | Cloudflare

div.h2: We are checking your browser... www.givefood.org.uk

div.p: Please stand by, while we are checking your browser...

input.name: vc

noscript.h1: Please turn JavaScript on and reload the page.

div.p: Please enable Cookies and reload the page.

div.h2: Why do I have to complete a CAPTCHA?
div.p: Completing the CAPTCHA proves you are a human and gives you temporary access to the web property.

div.h2: What can I do to prevent this in the future?
div.p: If you are on a personal connection, like at home, you can run an anti-virus scan on your device to make sure it is not infected with malware.
If you are at an office or shared network, you can ask the network administrator to run a scan across the network looking for misconfigured or infected devices.

div.class: cf-error-footer cf-wrapper w-240 lg:w-full py-10 sm:py-4 sm:px-8 mx-auto text-center sm:text-left border-solid border-0 border-t border-gray-300
